mapper.insert: insert into tb_user( gmt_create, gmt_modify, name, birthday, phone, email, auth_type, auth_openid, auth_username, auth_nickname, auth_logo, balance, region_id, recommend_openid) values ( now(), now(), "", null, "", "", #{thirdType}, #{thirdId}, "", #{nickname}, #{logo}, #{balance}, 0, #{recommendOpenid})
mapper.select: select id, name, birthday, phone, email, auth_type as authType, auth_openid as authOpenid, auth_username as username, auth_nickname as nickname, auth_logo as logo, balance, region_id as regionId, adviser_id as adviserId, recommend_openid as recommendOpenid, gmt_create as createDate from tb_user where auth_type = #{thirdType} and auth_openid = #{thirdId}
mapper.update: update tb_user set gmt_modify = now(), name = #{name}, balance =#{balance}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, auth_username = #{username}, auth_nickname = #{nickname}, auth_logo = #{logo}, region_id = #{regionId}, adviser_id = #{adviserId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, birthday, phone, email, auth_type as authType, auth_openid as authOpenid, auth_username as username, auth_nickname as nickname, auth_logo as logo, balance, region_id as regionId, adviser_id as adviserId, recommend_openid as recommendOpenid, gmt_create as createDate from tb_user where id=#{id} and auth_type!='BROKERAGE'
